lead_paragraph: An order by prosecutors “not to disclose the existence of this subpoena” was sharply rebuked by a federal judge. By law, recipients of subpoenas are free to tell anyone about them.

headline.main: Subpoena Ordering Recipients Not to Disclose

snippet: An order by prosecutors “not to disclose the existence of this subpoena” was sharply rebuked by a federal judge. By law, recipients of subpoenas are free to tell anyone about them.
